column2: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.
When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped for decades in it and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.
John and Max resolve to save their beloved bait shop from turning into an Italian restaurant, just as its new female owner catches Max's attention.
Based on Terry McMillan's novel, this film follows four very different African-American women and their relationships with the male gender.
In this sequel, George Banks deals not only with the pregnancy of his daughter, but also with the unexpected pregnancy of his wife.
A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.
An ugly duckling having undergone a remarkable change, still harbors feelings for her crush: a carefree playboy, but not before his business-focused brother has something to say about it.
A mischievous young boy, Tom Sawyer (),witnesses a murder by the deadly Injun Joe. Tom...
A disgraced former fireman takes on a group of terrorists holding the Vice President and others hostage during the seventh game of the NHL Stanley Cup finals.
James Bond teams up with the lone survivor of a destroyed Russian research center to stop the hijacking of a nuclear space weapon by a fellow agent believed to be dead.
Comedy-drama about a widowed U.S. president and a lobbyist who fall in love. It's all above-board, but "politics is perception" and sparks fly anyway.
Mel Brooks' parody of the classic vampire story and its famous film adaptations.
An outcast half-wolf risks his life to prevent a deadly epidemic from ravaging Nome, Alaska.
A biographical story of former U.S. president Richard Milhous Nixon, from his days as a young boy to his eventual presidency which ended in shame.
A female pirate and her companion race against their rivals to find a hidden island that contains a fabulous treasure.
Greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two mobster best friends and a trophy wife over a gambling empire.
Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the titular opposites.
Four interlocking tales that take place in a fading hotel on New Year's Eve.
Pet detective Ace Ventura comes out of retirement to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the symbol of an African tribe.
A vengeful New York transit cop decides to steal a trainload of subway fares; his foster brother, a fellow cop, tries to protect him.
A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.
An agoraphobic psychologist and a female detective must work together to take down a serial killer who copies serial killers from the past.
Professional hit-man Robert Rath wants to fulfill a few more contracts before retiring but unscrupulous ambitious newcomer hit-man Miguel Bain keeps killing Rath's targets.
A young bald albino boy with unique powers shakes up the rural community he lives in.

Ben Sanderson, an alcoholic Hollywood screenwriter who lost everything because of his drinking, arrives in Las Vegas to drink himself to death. There, he meets and forms an uneasy friendship and non-interference pact with prostitute Sera.
The evil Iago pretends to be friend of Othello in order to manipulate him to serve his own end in the film version of this Shakespeare classic.
Four 12-year-old girls grow up together during an eventful small-town summer in 1970.
Eight years earlier, Anne Elliot, the daughter of a financially troubled aristocratic family, was persuaded...
A scientist in a surrealist society kidnaps children to steal their dreams, hoping that they slow his aging process.
A provincial boy related to a Shanghai crime family is recruited by his uncle into cosmopolitan Shanghai in the 1930s to be a servant to a ganglord's mistress.
An ex-Marine turned teacher struggles to connect with her students in an inner city school.
In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.
While flying mail across the Andean mountains, Henri Guillaumet's plane has to crash-land, he must trek back to civilizatin on foot.
Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.
The platonic relationship between artist Dora Carrington and writer Lytton Strachey in the early 20th century.
A young Russian boy, Thomas Minton, travels to New York as a passenger on a Russian freighter. Close...
Alyssa (a rich girl) and Amanda (an orphan) are two little girls who are identical, but complete strangers...
A rich high school student tries to boost a new pupil's popularity, but reckons without affairs of the heart getting in the way.
A South-African preacher goes to search for his wayward son who has committed a crime in the big city.
The classic Shakespearean play about a murderously scheming king staged in an alternative fascist England setting.
A Vietnam vet adjusts to life after the war while trying to support his family, but the chance of a better life may involve crime and bloodshed.
An aspiring young physician, Robert Merivel found himself in the service of King Charles II and saves the life of a spaniel dear to the King...
Three unknowing martial artists are summoned to a mysterious island to compete in a tournament whose outcome will decide the fate of the world.
Suzanne Stone is an aspiring TV personality who will do anything to be in the spotlight, including enlisting three teenagers to kill her husband.
Bride-to-be Finn Dodd hears tales of romance and sorrow from her elders as they construct a quilt.
Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.
An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth-century Virginia.
A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which begin when five criminals meet at a seemingly random police lineup.
When he discovers his adopted son is a genius, a New York sportswriter seeks out the boy's birth mother: a prostitute.
Two Italian racketeers come to Albania just after the fall of the communists to set up a fictive firm and pocket the grants...
Another Disney underdog sports team of misfit kids (soccer this time) learns to play a new sport and become champions...
Sadie is desperately looking up to her older sister Georgia who is a famous C&W artist. Sadie wants to be a famous artist like her sister...

After losing her job, making out with her soon-to-be former boss and finding out that her daughter plans to spend Thanksgiving with her boyfriend, Claudia Larson faces spending the holiday with her family.
Simple Italian postman learns to love poetry while delivering mail to a famous poet; he uses this to woo local beauty Beatrice.
The year is 1952, in Quebec City. Rachel, 16, unmarried, and pregnant, works in the church. Filled with shame...
On his ninth birthday a boy receives many presents. Two of them first seem to be less important: an...

A frustrated composer finds fulfillment as a high school music teacher.

Frank O'Brien, a petty thief, and his 7-year-long girlfriend Roz want to put an end to their unsteady lifestyle and just do that _last_ job...
Moronic best friends get themselves locked inside the Bio-Dome, a science experiment, along with a group of environmental scientists for one year.
Jobe is resuscitated by Jonathan Walker. He wants Jobe to create a special computer chip that would...
It's a hot summer day in 1933 in South Philly, where 12-year old Gennaro lives with his widowed mom and his ailing grandpa...
After learning of her husband's infidelities, a housewife invites an itinerant lesbian to move in with them. None of their lives will ever be the same again.

Two homies, Smokey &Craig, smoke up a dope dealer's weed and try to figure a way to get the $200 they owe the dope dealer by 10:00pm that night. In that time they smoke weed, get jacked, and they get shot at in a drive-by.
Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in an establishment populated by vampires, with chaotic results.
Max Kirkpatrick is a cop who protects Kate McQuean, a civil law attorney, from a renegade KGB team out to terminate her.
Following graduation, a handful of college students do nothing and talk about it wittily.
Henri Fortin is poor and iliterate former boxer. Ziman is rich Jewish lawyer from Paris. During WWII...
Romantic drama about a young career girl who is swept off her feet by a shy florist, who fell in love...
(SIRIUS 6B, Year 2078) On a distant mining planet ravaged by a decade of war, scientists have created the perfect weapon: a blade-wielding...
A look into the many lives of Christa Päffgen, otherwise known as Nico; from cutie German mädchen to the first of the supermodels...
Freddie Gale is a seedy jeweler who has sworn to kill the drunk driver who killed his little girl.
When Annie Laird is selected as a juror in a big Mafia trial, she is forced by someone known as "The...
Several people try to take advantage of a little girl's innocence to hustle money her mom gave to her to buy a goldfish with.

A Dutch matron establishes and, for several generations, oversees a close-knit, matriarchal community where feminism and liberalism thrive.

Filmed entirely on location in East Hampton, Long Island, "Last Summer in the Hamptons" concerns a large...
In the 1800s a naturalist marries into a family of British aristocrats.
Teenage boys discover discipline and camaraderie on an ill-fated sailing voyage.
Young boy befriends larcenous orangutan in luxury hotel.
A gubernatorial candidate hires a wormy special assistant whose only job is to make sure the candidate's well-meaning but incompetent brother doesn't ruin the election.
An unimpressive, every-day man is forced into a situation where he is told to kill a politician to save his kidnapped daughter.
A housemaid falls in love with Dr. Jekyll and his darkly mysterious counterpart, Mr. Hyde.

Terrorists steal nuclear warheads from the U.S. military but don't count on a pilot and park ranger spoiling their plans.
Out of work actor Joe volunteers to help try and save his sister's local church for the community by putting on a Christmas production of Hamlet...
After local youth Abdel is beaten unconscious by police, a riot ensues on his estate during which a policeman loses his gun. The gun is found by Vinz who threatens he will kill a cop if Abdel dies.
Lone group of teens, led by recently released joyrider and his disenchanted Belfast girlfriend, strives...

Focusing on a trio of friends and their elaborate plan to pull off a simple robbery and go on the run.

A single and lonely woman finds the seemingly perfect man to date, but soon regrets it when his deranged and possessive other personality emerges and worst still, she cannot convince anyone else of his Jekyll/Hyde true nature.
Unsuccessfully framed for his wife's murder, Dr. David Krane attempts to find the real culprit by utilizing...

Photographer Robert Kincaid wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson, for four days in the 1960s.
On the brink of her 30th birthday, Fanny feels the door to marital happiness closing up on her. She is obsessed with death...
The Muppets' twist on the classic tale.

When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, William Wallace begins a revolt and leads Scottish warriors against the cruel English tyrant who rules Scotland with an iron fist.

A mentally unstable Vietnam war veteran works as a night-time taxi driver in New York City where the perceived decadence and sleaze feeds his urge for violent action, attempting to save a preadolescent prostitute in the process.
A young man visiting and helping his uncle in New York City finds himself forced to fight a street gang and the mob with his martial art skills.
Two parents deal with the effects when their son is accused of murdering his girlfriend.
In a town where half the men die down the coalpit, Margaret MacNeil is quite happy being single. Until she meets Neil Currie...

A bunch of high school misfits in Hawaii, introduced by their new teacher, attend a science fair in which they draw up inspiration to build their own solar car and win a trip to compete in the 1990 World Solar Challenge in Australia.

A successful executive and womanizer finds his lifestyle choices have turned back on him when his new female boss turns out to be an even bigger deviant then he is.
Two melancholy Hong Kong policemen fall in love: one with a mysterious female underworld figure, the other with a beautiful and ethereal server at a late-night restaurant he frequents.
A photographer and the types of people he encounters.
A young man, his wife, and his incompetent case worker travel across country to find his birth parents.
A young boy must restore order when a group of bullies steal the magical book that acts as a portal between Earth and the imaginary world of Fantasia.

A bright assistant D.A. investigates a gruesome hatchet murder and hides a clue he found at the crime scene. Under professional threats and an attempt on his life, he goes on heartbroken because evidence point to the woman he still loves.

An ambitious young woman, determined to build a career in TV journalism, gets good advice from her first boss, and they fall in love.

Set right after World War II, a naive teenage girl joins a shabby theatre troupe in Liverpool. During a winter production of Peter Pan...

A frigid young housewife decides to spend her midweek afternoons as a prostitute.

The U.S. President, low in the opinion polls, gets talked into raising his popularity by trying to start a cold war against Canada.

Young drug pushers in the projects of Brooklyn live hard dangerous lives, trapped between their drug bosses and the detectives out to stop them.
When an expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team is assembled to find out what went wrong.

Lancelot falls in love with Guinevere, who is due to be married to King Arthur. Meanwhile, a violent warlord tries to seize power from Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table.

A day in the life of a group of teens as they travel around New York City skating, drinking, smoking, and deflowering virgins.
Film about filmmaking. It takes place during one day on set of non-budget movie. Ultimate tribute to all independent filmmakers.

Both dumped by their girlfriends, two best friends seek refuge in the local mall.

A giant egg is unearthed at a construction site and soon opened, releasing the terrible Ivan Ooze, who wreaks vengeance on Zordon for imprisoning him millennia ago. With Zordon dying and their powers lost, the Rangers head to a distant planet to find the mystic warrior Dulcea.
A young widow still grieving over the death of her husband finds herself being comforted by a local housepainter.

Two cops, played by Seagal and Wayans, are forced to work together to solve a chain of mysterious killings by a killer nicknamed "The Family Man".
The unruly team of hockey misfits grows up a bit and receives scholarships to a prestigious prep school, where they take on the snotty varsity team.
A young man fresh out of law school tries to win a reprieve for his racist grandfather who is on death row.
Three orphan children strike gold in 1878 California.
Legends (and myths) from the life of famed American frontiersman Davey Crockett are depicted in this feature film edited from television episodes...
Two mysterious orphan children have extraordinary powers and are chased by a scheming millionaire. But where do these kids really call home?
A race car driver becomes a champion with a Volkswagen Beetle with a mind of its own.
The living Volkswagen Beetle helps an old lady protect her home from a corrupt developer.
A boy brings a yellow dog home. The dog loves the family as much as they love him, but can the love last ?
Teenage twin girls swap places and scheme to reunite their divorced parents.
A young girl comes to an embittered town and confronts its attitude with her determination to see the best in life.
Three pets escape from a California ranch to find their owners in San Francisco.
A teenage boy is cursed with periodically turning into an sheepdog.
A Swiss family must survive being shipwrecked on a deserted island.
A woman is kidnapped. While in captivity, she manages to send a message out with a wandering cat. The cat's owner calls the FBI...
A ship sent to investigate a wave of mysterious sinkings encounters the advanced submarine, the Nautilus, commanded by Captain Nemo.
When a Jamaican sprinter is disqualified to the Olympic Games, he enlists the help of a dishonored coach to start the first Jamaican Bobsled Team.
When a boy prays for a chance to have a family if the California Angels win the pennant, angels are assigned to make that possible.
When Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq, and from her Fairy Godmother.
Winnie the Pooh and his friends experience high winds, heavy rains, and a flood in Hundred Acre Wood.
Donald receives his birthday gifts, which include traditional gifts and information about Brazil (hosted by Zé Carioca) and Mexico (by Panchito, a Mexican Charro Rooster).
The wizard Merlin teaches a young boy who is destined to be King Arthur.
This heartwarming classic tells the tale of a country boy who adopts a mischevious black lamb and learns valuable lessons about love and dedication.
When Robin and his Moorish companion come to England and the tyranny of the Sheriff of Nottingham, he decides to fight back as an outlaw.
A magic nanny comes to work for a cold banker's unhappy family.
Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.
An orphan boy and his magical dragon come to town with his abusive adoptive parents in pursuit.
An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical conman search for the missing component to a magic spell useful to the defense of Britain.
Alice stumbles into the world of Wonderland. Will she get home? Not if the Queen of Hearts has her way.
Two childhood friends find themselves forced to become enemies.

A twisted take on 'Little Red Riding Hood' with a teenage juvenile delinquent on the run from a social worker traveling to her grandmother's house and being hounded by a charming, but sadistic, serial killer/pedophile.
A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a Naval officer widower.
John McClane, officer of the NYPD, tries to save wife Holly Gennaro and several others, taken hostage by German terrorist Hans Gruber during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.
A simple man is turned into a genius through the application of computer science.
Character study about Mildred, an elderly woman who has spent her life caring for others. When her daughter finally leaves home...
London of the late 19th century is a haven for political exiles of all sorts - refugees, partisans, anarchists...
A successful black woman discovers that her birth mother is a lower-class white woman, but the woman denies it. As emotions run high, everyone's secrets are exposed.
A Pennsylvania band scores a hit in 1964 and rides the star-making machinery as long as it can, with lots of help from its manager.
David loves his wife, Gillian. Unfortunately, she died two years ago. David deals with his grief by...
The passionate Merchant-Ivory drama tells the story of Francoise Gilot, the only lover of Pablo Picasso who was strong enough to withstand his ferocious cruelty and move on with her life.
Romeo & Juliet gets transplanted to the Bronx.

In a suburb of London, young Jamie is escaping sport hours, to avoid being the victim of his comrades. Young Ste, his neighbor, is beaten by his father, and comes to sleep overnight. They discover new feelings, sleeping in the same bed.
A woman suffering from amnesia begins to recover her memories after trouble from her past finds her again.
A bridge engineer and an experienced old hunter begin a hunt for two lions after they start attacking local construction workers.
Al Pacino's deeply-felt rumination on Shakespeare's significance and relevance to the modern world through interviews and an in-depth analysis of "Richard III."
Tommy is an unemployed mechanic who spends most of his time in a bar (Trees Lounge) in a small blue collar town. He seems to always be thinking, "If only X then I could stop drinking".
A disparate group of African-American men travel by bus to Washington, DC for the Million Man March.
Bobby Bishop (Sheen) is a special assistant to the President of the United States. Accidentally, he meets his friend professor Pochenko on the street...
A stonemason steadfastly pursues a cousin he loves. However their love is troubled as he is married...
A New York girl sets her father up with a beautiful woman in a shaky marriage while her half sister gets engaged.
Gustavo is a young Havana Communist who believes in the revolution; he hopes for a scholarship to study aeronautical engineering in Prague...
Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.
Wannabe actors become regulars in the stylish neo-lounge scene; Trent teaches his friend Mike the unwritten rules of the scene.
After a prank goes disastrously wrong, a group of boys are sent to a detention center where they are brutalized; over 10 years later, they get their chance for revenge.
At long last, Aladdin is about to marry the Princess Jasmine. Despite the presence and encouragement of his friends Genie...
A budding romance between a ballet master and a tapdancer becomes complicated when rumours surface that they're already married.
Lady Alyce Marshmorton must marry soon, and the staff of Tottney Castle have laid bets on who she'll choose...
A man is murdered, apparently by one of a group of soldiers just out of the army. But which one? And why?
After being hired to find an ex-con's former girlfriend, Philip Marlowe is drawn into a deeply complex web of mystery and deceit.

Nick Cochran, an American in exile in Macao, has a chance to restore his name by helping capture an international crime lord. Undercover, can he mislead the bad guys and still woo the handsome singer/petty crook, Julie Benson?
A poor boy wins the opportunity to tour the most eccentric and wonderful candy factory of all.
A young governess for two children becomes convinced that the house and grounds are haunted.
A nerdish store owner is revived out of cryostasis into a future world to fight an oppressive government.
When a bumbling New Yorker is dumped by his activist girlfriend, he travels to a tiny Latin American nation and becomes involved in its latest rebellion.
In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to doublecross each other for the loot.
Brian is born on the original Christmas, in the stable next door. He spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.
A struggling female soprano finds work playing a male female impersonator, but it complicates her personal life.
Bill McKay is a candidate for the U.S. Senate from California. He has no hope of winning, so he is willing to tweak the establishment.
Comedy about an early 20th century car race across three continents.
A somewhat romanticized account of the career of the notoriously violent bank robbing couple and their gang.
An old Cuban fisherman's dry spell is broken when he hooks a gigantic fish that drags him out to sea. Based on Ernest Hemingway's story.
An ex-tennis pro carries out a plot to murder his wife. When things go wrong, he improvises a brilliant plan B.
Spending the summer in a holiday camp with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor Johnny Castle.
After a simple jewelery heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.
A young recruit in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.
A pair of losers try to pretend that their murdered employer is really alive, but the murderer is out to "finish him off."
A police detective is in charge of the investigation of a brutal murder, in which a beautiful and seductive woman could be involved.

The story of the famous and influential 1960s rock band and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison, from his days as a UCLA film student in Los Angeles, to his untimely death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.
A British soldier is kidnapped by IRA terrorists. He befriends one of his captors, who is drawn into the soldier's world.
An examination of the machinations behind the scenes at a real estate office.
A mother has to make a very difficult decision.
A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home-world.
While working on a documentary on his old neighborhood, a young film school graduate shifts the focus...
On Christmas Eve, an old miser named Ebenezer Scrooge is visited by the spirit of his former partner...
A young hot-shot stock car driver gets his chance to compete at the top level.

As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.
A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.
Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.
All the kids in a town over night become feverish and have convulsions. The next day they start to become evil...
A dark comedy about the wild night Hank has when he discovers that he has won a $200 million lottery jackpot.
A documentary on insect life in meadows and ponds.
Jerry and his two pals, Russ and Syd, are just looking for some easy money to help them break out of their nowhere lives in their nowhere town...
A comedy about making it on Wall Street. Prejudices are hard to break and Laurel Ayres quickly learns that in order for people to take her seriously she has to work for an older white man or be one.
New York City, the 1930s. A powerful crime family is caught in a lethal crossfire between union organizers and brutal corporate bosses...
Early one morning Valerie has to tell her unemployed boyfriend Remi that she is pregnant. She has decided to keep the child...
An unusual and wonderful friendship develops between a busy but unhappy salesman and a resident of a mental asylum.
At the beginning of a nightly Alcoholics Anonymous meeting, Jim seems particularly troubled. His sponsor encourages him to talk that night...
A partially idealized film of the controversial pornography publisher and how he became a defender of free speech for all people.
The filmmakers follow Oliver North's unsuccessful 1994 bid for a Virginia Senate seat, focusing on North's campaign strategist...
The loons are back again on Golden Pond and so are Norman Thayer, a retired professor, and Ethel who...
Inspector Clouseau is put on the case when the Pink Panther diamond is stolen, with the Phantom's trademark glove the only clue.
A young woman finds her already unstable life rocked by the presence of a rambunctious imaginary friend from childhood.
A civilian diving team are enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

Legend says that Antonio Bay was built in 1880 with blood money obtained from shipwrecked lepers but no one believes it. On the eve of the town's centennial many plan to attend the celebrations, including the murdered lepers.
In 1997, when the US President crashes into Manhattan, now a giant maximum security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in for a rescue.
After a bizarre and near fatal encounter with a serial killer, a television newswoman is sent to a remote mountain resort whose residents may not be what they seem.
A greedy landowner and his backward nephew conspire to block the only water source for an adjoining property in order to bankrupt the owner and force him to sell.
A beautiful but shy shepherdess plots vengeance on the men whose greedy conspiracy to acquire her father's land caused his death years earlier.
A sheltered young high society woman joins the United States Army on a whim and finds herself in a more difficult situation than she ever expected.
King Arthur and his knights embark on a low-budget search for the Grail, encountering many very silly obstacles.
Take a walk into the weird world of filmmaker Raul Ruiz as he takes us to Paris for a twisted ride....
A documentary of the 1974 heavyweight championship bout in Zaire between champion George Foreman and underdog challenger Muhammad Ali.
Wallace is used by a criminal penguin in a robbery involving mechanical trousers.
In medieval France, some villagers challenge a man's claim of identity when he (as he says) returns home from some time in the army.
A very free adaptation of Marlowe's 'Doctor Faustus', Goethe's 'Faust' and various other treatments...
This film-noir piece, told in semi-documentary style, follows police on the hunt for a resourceful criminal who shoots and kills a cop.
Two US Treasury agents hunt a successful counterfeiting ring.
A four-year old boy, Pricò, becomes the subject of emotional folly by his fluctuant parents and inattentive relatives.
Danzig in the 1920s/1930s. Oskar Matzerath, son of a local dealer, is a most unusual boy. Equipped with...

A member of the House of Lords dies, leaving his estate to his son. Unfortunately, his son thinks he is Jesus Christ. The other somewhat-more respectable members of their family plot to steal the estate from him. Murder and mayhem ensues.
The film tells the story of two girls who are of totally different character. They know each other since...
When letters written to God start getting results, and replies, people everywhere are amazed. The Post Office however is annoyed.
One man's struggle to contain the curse he hides within... and his last-ditch attempt to free himself with the love of family...
Chronicles the six-month strike at Hormel in Austin, Minnesota, in 1985-86. The local union, P-9 of the Food and Commercial Workers...
A right-wing folk singer becomes a corrupt politician and runs a crooked election campaign. Only one independent muck-raking reporter is trying to stop him.
The wife of an oafish restaurant owner becomes bored with her husband and considers an affair with a regular patron.
Post-apocalyptic surrealist black comedy about the landlord of an apartment building who occasionally prepares a delicacy for his odd tenants.
Two parallel stories about two identical women; one living in Poland, the other in France. They don't know each other, but their lives are nevertheless profoundly connected.
This slow-paced gem is about the civilizing influence of Italy on beleaguered Londoners both male and...
When soldiers in World War I refuse to continue with an impossible attack, their superior officers decide to make an example of them.
A small-time conman has torn loyalties between his estranged mother and new girlfriend--both of whom are high-stakes grifters with their own angles to play.
The story is of a small town in the early west and of a 'shooter' of reputation that drifts into it...
At the close of WWII, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.
Greek Sea, World War II. An Italian ship leaves a handful of soldiers in a little island; their mission...
Christy Brown, born with cerebral palsy, learns to paint and write with his only controllable limb - his left foot.
A sexually repressed woman's husband is having an affair with her sister. The arrival of a visitor with a rather unusual fetish changes everything.
May-Alice Culhane was a successful soap opera star, but a car accident has left her bound to a wheelchair...
A maverick dancer risks his career by performing an unusual routine and sets out to succeed with a new partner.
A film that successfully argued that a man was wrongly convicted for murder by a corrupt justice system in Dallas County, Texas.
An unbalanced but alluring former mental patient takes a porn star prisoner in the hopes of convincing her to marry him.
Documentary following singer Madonna on her controversial Blond Ambition tour in 1990.
A chronicle of New York's drag scene in the 1980s, focusing on balls, voguing and the ambitions and dreams of those who gave the era its warmth and vitality.
Upon admittance to a mental institution, a brash rebel rallies the patients to take on the oppressive head nurse.
Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van - made entirely of marijuana - from Mexico to L.A., with incompetent Sgt. Stedenko on their trail.

After the rebels have been brutally overpowered by the Empire on their newly established base, Luke Skywalker takes advanced Jedi training with Master Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader as part of his plan to capture Luke.
While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him a story called The Princess Bride.
Archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the US government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.
A bureaucrat in a retro-future world tries to correct an administrative error and himself becomes an enemy of the state.
The planet from  (1979) has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, the rescue team has impressive firepower, but will it be enough?
A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.
London, 1969 - two 'resting' (unemployed and unemployable) actors, Withnail and Marwood, fed up with damp...
A dissenting juror in a murder trial slowly manages to convince the others that the case is not as obviously clear as it seemed in court.
Follows a brilliant, flamboyant and controversial British military figure and his conflicted loyalties during wartime service.

In future Britain, charismatic delinquent Alex DeLarge is jailed and volunteers for an experimental aversion therapy developed by the government in an effort to solve society's crime problem - but not all goes according to plan.
Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his kids against prejudice.
During the Vietnam War, Captain Willard is sent on a dangerous mission into Cambodia to assassinate a renegade colonel who has set himself up as a god among a local tribe.
Epic story of a mysterious stranger with a harmonica who joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.
After rescuing Han Solo from the palace of Jabba the Hutt, the rebels attempt to destroy the second Death Star, while Luke struggles to make Vader return from the dark side of the Force.
An angel tires of overseeing human activity and wishes to become human when he falls in love with a mortal.
Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, black-market opportunist Harry Lime.
Henry Hill and his friends work their way up through the mob hierarchy.
The commercial vessel Nostromo receives a distress call from an unexplored planet. After searching for survivors, the crew heads home only to realize that a deadly bioform has joined them.
A man is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must battle an army of the dead and retrieve the Necronomicon so he can return home.
Enzo and Jacques have known each other for a long time. Their friendship started in their childhood days in the Mediterranean...
An elderly lord abdicates to his three sons, and the two corrupt ones turn against him.
A disillusioned assassin accepts one last hit in hopes of using his earnings to restore vision to a singer he accidentally blinded, only to be double-crossed by his boss.
A Phoenix secretary steals $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.
Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on his crime syndicate stretching from Lake Tahoe, Nevada to pre-revolution 1958 Cuba.
A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the U.S.-Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.
Wallace and Gromit have run out of cheese and this provides an excellent excuse for the animated duo to take their holiday on the moon...
The gritty adaption of William Shakespeare's play about the English King's bloody conquest of France.
The incredible story of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, told by his peer and secret rival Antonio Salieri - now confined to an insane asylum.
A retired American boxer returns to the village where he was born in Ireland, where he finds love.
A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.
An emotionally self-destructive boxer's journey through life, as the violence and temper that leads him to the top in the ring, destroys his life outside it.
Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditsy Annie Hall.
The story of the original Mercury 7 astronauts and their macho, seat-of-the-pants approach to the space program.
A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.
The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth, and sheer terror.
In Chicago in September 1936, a young con man seeking revenge for his murdered partner teams up with a master of the big con to win a fortune from a criminal banker.
Young, rich, and obsessed with death, Harold finds himself changed forever when he meets lively septuagenarian Maude at a funeral.
When high school dropout Maria Coughlin announces her pregnancy to her parents, her father drops dead on the floor...
A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.
An American oil company sends a man to Scotland to buy up an entire village where they want to build a refinery. But things don't go as expected.

A human-looking indestructible cyborg is sent from 2029 to 1984 to assassinate a waitress, whose unborn son will lead humanity in a war against the machines, while a soldier from that war is sent to protect her at all costs.
A young man's mother is bitten by a Sumatran rat-monkey. She gets sick and dies, at which time she comes back to life, killing and eating dogs, nurses, friends, and neighbors.
Robert Gould Shaw leads the US Civil War's first all-black volunteer company, fighting prejudices of both his own Union army and the Confederates.
Two minor characters from the play, "Hamlet" stumble around unaware of their scripted lives and unable to deviate from them.
The life of a divorced television writer dating a teenage girl is further complicated when he falls in love with his best friend's mistress.
Tom Regan, an advisor to a Prohibition-era crime boss, tries to keep the peace between warring mobs but gets caught in divided loyalties.
English teacher John Keating inspires his students to discover their love for poetry and seize the day.
A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.
A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in a Mexican border town.
Convicted felon Nikita, instead of going to jail, is given a new identity and trained, stylishly, as a top secret spy/assassin.

After settling his differences with a Japanese PoW camp commander, a British colonel co-operates to oversee his men's construction of a railway bridge for their captors - while oblivious to a plan by the Allies to destroy it.
A harried movie director retreats into his memories and fantasies.
A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption and murder.
An alien lands and tells the people of Earth that they must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets.
Fred Dobbs and Bob Curtin, two Americans searching for work in Mexico, convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.
The population of a small town disappears and is replaced by aliens that chase human flesh for their intergalactic fast-food chain.
Rufus T. Firefly is named president/dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of wealthy Mrs. Teasdale.
A teenager has to deal with his girlfriend dumping him among family crises, homicidal paper boys, and a rival skier.

A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil and spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.
After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.
When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.
The lone survivor of an onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits holds up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.
Allied P.O.W.s plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.
An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam war impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

Two tapes, two Parisian mob killers, one corrupt policeman, an opera fan, a teenage thief, and the coolest philosopher ever filmed. All these characters twist their way through an intricate and stylish French language thriller.
A weatherman finds himself living the same day over and over again.
Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner and a young man.
A former Korean War POW is brainwashed by Communists into becoming a political assassin. But another former prisoner may know how to save him.
Mark runs a pirate radio station and causes an uproar when he speaks his mind and enthralls fellow teens.
A drama critic learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are homicidal maniacs, and that insanity runs in his family.

A young man is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his friend, Dr. Emmett Brown, and must make sure his high-school-age parents unite in order to save his own existence.
A housewife who is unhappy with her life befriends an old lady in a nursing home and is enthralled by the tales she tells of people she used to know.
The World War II phase of the career of the controversial American general, George S. Patton.
The story of three different men in a Louisiana prison and their eventual journey.
A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psionic psychopath that only two kids and a group of psionics can stop.
An immortal Scottish swordsman must confront the last of his immortal opponent, a murderously brutal barbarian who lusts for the fabled "Prize".
A man refuses to conform to life in a rural prison.
Embarrassed by his large nose, a romantic poet/soldier romances his cousin by proxy.
Dr. Frankenstein's grandson, after years of living down the family reputation, inherits granddad's castle and repeats the experiments.
An anthology of 5 different cab drivers in 5 American and European cities and their remarkable fares on the same eventful night.
A young woman becomes the fourth wife of a wealthy lord, and must learn to live with the strict rules and tensions within the household.
Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.
A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music.
A marshall, personally compelled to face a returning deadly enemy, finds that his own town refuses to help him.
Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a rich family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail, and what might be love.
A girl who half-heartedly tries to be part of the "in crowd" of her school meets a rebel who teaches her a more devious way to play social politics; killing the popular kids.
A Chicago playwright uses self-hypnosis to find the actress whose vintage portrait hangs in a grand hotel.
When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.
Spinal Tap, one of England's loudest bands, is chronicled by film director Marty DeBergi on what proves to be a fateful tour.
A collection of expertly photographed phenomena with no conventional plot. The footage focuses on nature, humanity and the relationship between them.
A young tomboy, Watts, finds her feelings for her best friend, Keith, run deeper than just friendship...
When Dr. Henry Jones Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Indiana Jones must follow in his father's footsteps and stop the Nazis.
A simple, sheltered gardener becomes an unlikely trusted advisor to a powerful businessman and an insider in Washington politics.
The life of the lawyer who became the famed leader of the Indian revolts against the British rule through his philosophy of nonviolent protest.
In 1968, a Czech doctor with an active sex life meets a woman who wants monogamy, and then the Soviet invasion further disrupts their lives.
When Lucy Honeychurch and chaperone Charlotte Bartlett find themselves in Florence with rooms without views...
Teenage geniuses deal with their abilities while developing a laser.
A confined but troubled rock star descends into madness in the midst of his physical and social isolation from everyone.
A photographer is trapped in Cambodia during tyrant Pol Pot's bloody "Year Zero" cleansing campaign, which claimed the lives of two million "undesirable" civilians.
A boy and his brother don't get along well. In order to let their ill mother rest, they're separated and sent each one with their relatives.
A starship crew goes to investigate the silence of a planet's colony only to find two survivors and a deadly secret that one of them has.
An Iowa corn farmer, hearing voices, interprets them as a command to build a baseball diamond in his fields; he does, and the Chicago Black Sox come.
Two British soldiers in India decide to resign from the Army and set themselves up as deities in Kafiristan--a land where no white man has set foot since Alexander.
Two Western bank/train robbers flee to Bolivia when the law gets too close.
A man is found in the desert after four years.
Set in 1999, a woman (Dommartin) has a car accident with some bank robbers, who enlist her help to take the bank money to a drop in Paris...
Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.
Documentary covering the growth and subsequent overexposure of the Seattle "grunge" music scene in the early 90s
An evil millionaire (Hulk Hogan) gets amnesia and then belives that he is Santa Claus.
An ambitious female attorney wallows in excess and meaningless sex with both male and female partners, while dealing with her personal life problems including helping her kleptomaniac sister.
Female (many of them lesbian) artists, writers, photographers, designers, and adventurers settled in Paris between the wars...
Old Nat Moyer is a talker, a philosopher, and a troublemaker with a fanciful imagination. His companion is Midge Carter...
JC is at the end of his Twenties and is living with his girlfriend Chloe in a small coastal town in England...
Ripley continues to be stalked by a savage alien, after her escape pod crashes on a prison planet.
Two American college students on a walking tour of Britain are attacked by a werewolf that none of the locals will admit exists.
Jacob Sterling brings home a mysterious clock from the infamous Amityville house, not knowing that it's haunted by demonic spirits.

A reporter moves into the ominous Long Island house to debunk it of the recent supernatural events and becomes besieged by the evil manifestations which are connected to a hell-spawn demon lurking in the basement.
A children's doll house, which is a miniature of the infamous haunted Long Island house, is given to a young girl where the demonic evil soon comes out to cause more terror.
An old mirror from the haunted Long Island house finds its way into a photographer's family where the evil soon manifests itself to cause more terror and mayhem.
A family moves into their new home, which proves to be evil, resulting in the demonic possession of the teenage son. Only the local priest can save him.
Newlyweds move into a large house where a mass murder was committed, and experience strange manifestations which drive them away.
Five people spend the night in an abandoned house, the Amityville haunted house, and soon find themselves terrorized by assorted ghosts, venomous insects and ghostly apparitions.
Udo Kier is without a doubt the sickliest of vampires in any director's interpretation of the Bram Stoker tale...
A group of nine college students staying at a friend's remote island mansion begin to fall victim to an unseen murderer over the April Fool's day weekend.
A stranger attempts to convince a happily married couple that their daughter is actually his daughter reincarnated.
A New York psychiatrist finds that a voodoo cult, which believes in child sacrifice, has a keen interest in his own son.

Harriet and Queenie Mahoney, a vaudeville act, come to Broadway, where their friend Eddie Kerns needs...

When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigour.

Rocky has been holding the title as the heavyweight champion until he is defeated by a brutal challenger, and now must regain his fighting spirit through a big rematch, trained by an unlikely ally: his old nemesis Apollo Creed.

After iron man Drago, a highly intimidating 6-foot-5, 261-pound Soviet athlete, kills Apollo Creed in an exhibition match, Rocky comes to the heart of Russia for 15 pile-driving boxing rounds of revenge.
Reluctantly retired from boxing and back from riches to rags, Rocky takes on a new protege who betrays him; As the champ's son must adjust to his family's new life after bankruptcy.

In a futuristic world that has embraced ape slavery, Caesar, the son of the late simians Cornelius and Zira, surfaces after almost twenty years of hiding out from the authorities, and prepares for a slave revolt against humanity.

The world is shocked by the appearance of three talking chimpanzees, who arrived mysteriously in a U.S. spacecraft. They become the toast of society; but one man believes them to be a threat to the human race.

Two less than successful film producers, approaching mid-life crisis and clinging to their nerdy sci-fi obsessions, suddenly meet their idol: .

Memoir of the lives of a family growing up on a post World War I British estate headed up by a strong disciplinarian...

Set in 1954, a group of Florida high schoolers seek out to help a buddy lose his virginity, which leads them to seek revenge on a sleazy nightclub owner and his redneck sheriff brother for harassing them.

For Moncho, it's an idyllic year: he starts school, he has a wonderful teacher, he makes a friend in Roque...

Series of short, highly irreverent, and quite often tasteless skits.

Colonel James Braddock has a Vietnamese wife who was supposed to leave Vietnam with him when they evacuate...

Animation done to contemporary popular music.
An anthology of animated vignettes set to contemporary music.
